tool_description: Movie, TV Show Details and Anime streaming api
name: dejavu
title: dejavu

api_list.name: Movie Details
Search
Trending TV Shows
api_list.description: Get all the trending tv shows
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dejavu1.p.rapidapi.com/trending-tv-shows"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dejavu1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
